selected_skills.name: map_value_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: To map the identified pattern or value to one of the given options A, B, C, D, or E.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to determine which option corresponds to the identified pattern or value in the sequence.

selected_skills.name: count_objects_in_diagram
selected_skills.purpose: To analyze the diagram and count specific objects or features that may help in identifying the pattern.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to count objects or features in the diagram that are relevant to identifying the sequence pattern.

new_skill_specs.name: identify_pattern_in_sequence
new_skill_specs.purpose: To identify the pattern or rule governing the sequence of objects in the diagram.

tests.input: diagram with a clear geometric progression
